mapper.select: SELECT location_id locationId, street_address streetAddress, postal_code postalCode, city,state_province stateProvince, country_id countryId FROM locations ORDER BY location_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO locations ( location_id, street_address, postal_code, city, state_province, country_id ) VALUES ( #{locationId}, #{streetAddress}, #{postalCode}, #{city}, #{stateProvince}, #{countryId} )
